State Capitals Quiz

Welcome to the State Capitals Quiz! This app is designed to test your knowledge of U.S. state capitals. Each quiz consists of 6 questions, each asking you to identify the capital city of a given state from among 3 possible choices.


Open the navigation drawer to view the main menu and navigate between app functions. You will be able to access the following screens:



Start Quiz

Begin a new quiz where you’ll be presented with 6 multiple-choice questions. Try to correctly identify as many state capitals as possible.



View Past Results

Review your past quiz attempts and see how well you’ve done. You can view your scores and track your progress over time.



Get Help

Access useful information about the app, including how to navigate and use each feature.



Exit Quiz

Close the app and end your quiz session.



Enjoy challenging yourself with the State Capitals Quiz and improve your knowledge of U.S. geography!
